column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Unruly patrons have Yamehwi at wit's end.
Collect well water.
Use the well water to sober up unruly patrons.
Speak with Yamehwi.
<sigh> Now what am I supposed to do?
Say, you strike a rather imposing figure. Can I ask a favor of you?

A few of our regulars have gotten a little too deep in their cups, and all their commotion is starting to turn away customers. They refuse to leave, and there's not much more I can do without stirring up trouble.

Someone as intimidating as you, on the other hand, could get away with a great deal. In fact, I'd wager you could douse them with water and they'd sooner go home than lift a finger against you. There's a well not far from here if you'd be willing to try and sober them up.
Between you and me, they could all stand to take a bath anyway. A quick drenching with water from the well should bring them to their senses.
Hey, do you... Do you know <hic> what time it is? I suppose it doesn't matter.
Pffft! What was that for!?
Dammit, now I need to go and get changed.
No, no, no! I don't wanna hear it! I don't pay you to talk─now go and get my drink!
Bugger me with a rroneek's horn, that's cold! What're you trying to do, drown me!?
Bah, I'm too tired for this. I'm going home...
Come on, don't be shy! Just follow the rhythm and let your hips do the rest.
Hey, what are you─ And I was just getting warmed up.
Oh gods, what time is it? The boss'll kill me if I'm late again!
I saw the whole thing. Thank you so much.
They can get carried away sometimes after a few drinks, but they're good folk. Miners and railroad workers, the lot of them, as are most of the people who pass through here.
After a long, grueling day, they'll often stop by and unwind for a good spell.
It's only when they get a little <Emphasis>too</Emphasis> comfortable that it starts to become a problem.
A problem for another day, thanks to you. I know it's not much, but I'd like you to have this. After all your help, it's the least I can offer.
